CardData.FlavorText: …the spiders began to come back, more full of rage than ever. Bilbo immediately went to the end of the branch nearest the tree-trunk and kept back those that crawled up. —The Hobbit

Localization.Title: Defend the Cocoons
Localization.Text:
Cannot engage. 
Defend for a number of rounds equal to the Quest value.
Resolve to allow travel
